data.name: Quarry Simulator 2021
data.detailed_description: Quarry Simulator - innovation simulator and economical strategy about creation of the quarries. You beginner magnat and you need earn some money for his bussiness. INOVATION AND ORIGINAL IDEA. For beggining, you'll need to choose and buy place of your quarry, after you need to explore this place, when you'll have all information about theritory, you can dig the ground. You can use dynamite for destroy the hills. After you'll use some big drills and big trucks for the mine the raw ores, also you can have direct control of the drills and the cars, those have realistic physics. At the next big location you can using miners trolley and after big trains with ores, that transport ores to the railway station. Using government contracts for mine gold and diamonds.  After all mining works you will  need recover landscape and plant new grass and trees.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R7 240
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
